definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: European commissioner Chris Patten caught the mood when he suggested yesterday that Israel had dealt with a fire by pouring gasoline on the flames.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟外委会专员彭定康称，以色列这是往火上浇油。

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一台出口欧盟的钻机由南阳二机石油装备集团制造。

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，马凯国务委员成功访问欧盟总部。

sentences.english: Miliband said the response by the European Union and NATO should be hard-headed engagement.
sentences.chinese: 米利班德说，欧盟和北约对此应该做出强硬的反应。

sentences.english: The EU reckons that Intel's use of such rebates was nefarious.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟认为，英特尔利用返点促销用意恶毒。

sentences.english: The government wants the European Union to permit visa-free travel for Turkish citizens.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其政府希望欧盟应当为土耳其公民免除签证。

sentences.english: But the architects did not even have the brains to choose the second.
sentences.chinese: 然则欧盟的设计师连选择第二套方案的智商也没有。

sentences.english: Russia banned all fresh-produce imports from the European Union last week.
sentences.chinese: 俄国于上周禁止了欧盟区所有新鲜农产品的进口。

sentences.english: Montenegro is one of the non-EU states which uses the euro.
sentences.chinese: 黑山共和国是一个非欧盟成员国使用欧元的国家。

sentences.english: The European Commission proposed new measures to reform the European Union’s common agricultural policy.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲委员会提出改革欧盟共同农业政策的新举措。

sentences.english: The European Union, meanwhile, is largely absent from this debate.
sentences.chinese: 同时，欧盟很大程度上是缺席这场辩论的。

sentences.english: Europeanization and European Integration are two central terms in the EU study.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲化和一体化是欧盟研究的两个核心概念。

sentences.english: But Ludivine Kedziora, 29, is an EU supporter.
sentences.chinese: 但是29岁的凯季奇拉是欧盟的支持者。

sentences.english: It's a chance for Poland to be in the mainstream of the EU, and to be engaged in global affairs, " Balcer noted."
sentences.chinese: 这是波兰融入欧盟主流，参与全球事务的一个机会。

sentences.english: An even bigger question involves the future co-operation between the IMF and EU.
sentences.chinese: 更大的一个问题涉及货币基金组织与欧盟未来的合作。

sentences.english: Welcome to the open house of the Chinese Mission.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎大家出席中国驻欧盟使团的“开放日”活动。

definition: abbr. for 歐洲共同體|欧洲共同体, European Community (old term for the EU, European Union)
to withdraw from the European Union/abbr. for 脫離歐盟|脱离欧盟

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: European Community, old term for EU, European Union 歐盟|欧盟[Ou1 meng2]
European common market (old term for EU, European Union)
pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 gong4 tong2 shi4 chang3
